protein.specific_function: May be implicated in the differentiation of cortical neurons and may play a role in cholesterol homeostasis

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides

reference.reference_text: Ding K, McDonough SJ, Kullo IJ: Evidence for positive selection in the C-terminal domain of the cholesterol metabolism gene PCSK9 based on phylogenetic analysis in 14 primate species. PLoS One. 2007 Oct 31;2(10):e1098.
